title: Democratic Debate Preview & Hong Kong
itunes:title: Democratic Debate Preview & Hong Kong
description:
Kevin spoke with Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News Politics Editor, Joel Payne, Democratic Strategist, former Director of African-American media outreach for Hillary Clinton presidential campaign, Tyler Pager, Bloomberg News National Political Correspondent, and Robert Shapiro, founder and chairman of Sonecon.


They previewed the Democratic presidential debate, the impeachment hearing and Gordon Sondland's testimony, and Hong Kong.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
